```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) # contains ggplot and data manipulation tools
library(gapminder)
```

# Prep 'gapminder' data

```{r data prep}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2002) ->
gapminder_2002

gapminder_2002 %>% 
  count(continent) ->
gapminder_continent_count
```
